title: Ups and Downs
short_desc: Further travels through deep space lead the VP to a utopian planet that treats them rather nicely.

content.text: How long have we been out in deep space?
A couple of semesters, give or take.
Seth stares out into the void, bored.
A long ass time...
Bout' three months... Maybe more.
Jim yawns.
Our navigation is screwed.
Emmett taps the console. The course is charted for a cruise liner thousands of AU away.
Where were we headed, anyway?
Space Station Zeta 0-1.
We were supposed to be heading to a cruise.
Zeta Ships...
Hm.
Ahh, remember our last cruise? Such fun, with the Blobmali Pirates.
We need to stop if we are going any further.
Jim butts his head in to the pilot's console, notices the low fuel and gets lightly kicked away by Emmett.
Fuel is getting low and we are running out of edible food...
Jim holds his knees and gets away from the pilot's console, having forgotten how protective Emmett was of it.
... Someone put three stacks of grass in the fridge...
t!8ball Does the crew spot a nearby planet?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Brakia.
Emmett gets up, in the mood to smoke.
I am saved.
It's wheat.
Jim was trying to screw with Emmett.
t!8ball Does the crew spot a nearby planet?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Brakia.
It's grass. Don't worry, little buddy.
Hey look.
t!8ball Does Matthias wake up from a deep slumber?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Enchantingtable2013.
Seth puts on some shades and sees two perky hills on the planet.
Look at the tits on that planet.
Emmett takes a stack out of the fridge.
Mega milk...
Seth sits down and gets comfy, spreading his legs.
I hope you're talking about the women on the planet.
t!8ball Does the planet wink at Seth and Emmett?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Bagelwrecker.
Ibraxas notices this wink and pinches his brow.
Oh god dammit.
t!8ball Is the planet a living planet that is in love with the ship?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, TheBlade.
Emmett overlooks the winking planet and notices buildings with the Llamanian Empire insignia.
I see a Llamanian presence...
Emmett frowns.
We'll land.
Be on your gaurd...
Its a space shuttle, not a sea ship..
I'll go get landing clearance.
Seth heads to his room and grabs his trusty ape disguise.
Wear this ape disguise, Emmett.
Seth tosses the costume at Emmett before heading to the cockpit.
What?
t!8ball Does Emmett put on the head of the disguise?
ðŸŽ± | Better not tell you now, Zander.
t!8ball Does Emmett put on the head of the disguise?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Zander.
Emmett lets the costume hit the floor, the smell being revolting.
I'm not putting on your shit-filled ape disguise.
Seth heads back to Emmett and screams in his ear.
K!
Emmett holds his ears in pain.
My ears!
Why did I ever agree to come with you guys...
Jim shakes his head.
They would have probably killed you otherwise.
Seth activates the spacelink and speaks into the microphone.
Hello ladies, mind if you give our handsome ship some of your sexy landing clearance?
t!8ball Does the crew get legal parking clearance?
ðŸŽ± | It is certain, Brakia.
Of course, handsome.
Alright, We're headed down.
The ship starts to land with the instructions sent by the nav crew.
We'll be landing then, lets get a drink later.
We'll need to check your ship out for any forms of... contraband, however, hon'.
I got some contraband you can check right here.
Seth takes a picture of his beautiful face and sends it over spacelink.
Ibraxas whispers in a panic.
Shit, shit, shit, shit!
Not your tiny package, elfling.
Shieeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeet!
Damn.
Emmett runs to his cabin and hides under the covers in his bed.
t!8ball Does Seth flash his cock and are the women impressed by how large his penis is?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Bagelwrecker.
Ibraxas sees Seth's giant cock for the first time and his eyes widen in surprise at its girth and the fact that he stripped naked.
Jesus CHRIST dude!
Holy shit, your shlong is huge.
t!8ball Are the women half blind?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, TheBlade.
Why the fuck would you do that?!
Ibraxas looks away, embarrassed.
Gotta prove it.
Seth starts gyrating his hips.
Just put your penis away..
Emmett shivers.
Help me...
Emmett, we might find that dentist here.
Jim is currently erasing his memory banks of Seth's dick.
t!8ball Does Emmett get persuaded from Seth's argument?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, Zander.
Ok, lets see if we can find a landing spot where we can re-feul
Emmett sticks his head out the covers, curious about his dead girlfriend who kept invading his dreams in the past month.
Fine.
Are the women up front Llamanian?
Hohoho, I woke up from my nightmare!
The Mickey Mouse Ghost exits the Disney Jewel, stretching.
Jim sighs after hearing the ghost announce its arrival.
They look like they were mixed with goats...
Seth looks at the sheep people with curiosity, having never seen a normal sheep in his life.
One was a human though.
Emmett slips out his bed and looks at the people Seth was talking about.
Definitely not squoatlings.
Humans in deep space is a good thing... right?
The ship's hatch opens up, and the crew is welcomed with open arms.
Ooh, a cop...
The contraband rubs herself about Jim, inspecting him, her wool being soft as clouds.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas explore the planet?
ðŸŽ± | Concentrate and ask again, Brakia.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas explore the planet?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Brakia.
Oh, uh yes? Hi...
Jim blushes and lets the contraband cop frisk him without even realizing it.
Seth mutters.
Definitely, but you see how they look like llamas and squoatlings mixed?
Emmett isn't sure how to feel about this revelation, but speaks based on his hatred of Llamanians.
That disgusts me if it's true...
Is hat a cop? What's going on?
The Mickey Mouse Ghost picks up the Contraband Cop's hat and inspects it, thinking it was the cop instead of the Ovisaron that wore it.
Don't be a racist, man.
Evidently, Seth was trying to bone, so he's pushed his abhorrance of llamanians aside.
Do I have clearance to explore, miss?
t!8ball Do they check the ship?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Bagelwrecker.
Let us explore your interior first, human.
Of course.
I have something to sell my soul!
The Mickey Mouse Ghost pulls out a pinwheel toy and spins it.
Is that a squoatling?
Seth sweats a bit before slapping Emmett in the back of the head.
No.
He's retarded.
Ibraxas puts aa hand around Emmett as a formm of protection.
He's wearing a mask.
He's black.
Emmett rolls his eyes and shrugs Ibraxas off.
Yeah, I'm a squoatling. Ignore their stupidity.
t!8ball Do the Women believe that its a mask?
ðŸŽ± | Ask again later, TheBlade.
t!8ball Do the Women believe that its a mask?
ðŸŽ± | Very doubtful, TheBlade.
The cop tilts her head in Emmett's direction.
We don't see many of those around these parts.
Shit.
t!8ball Does the Mickey Mouse Ghost scare the women by saying boo?
ðŸŽ± | It is certain, Tom Thompson.
The others are afraid of the sudden appearance of the Mickey Mouse Ghost, however the Contraband Cop continues her work, handling Seth's Desert Eagle.
Handle that Desert Eagle with care please...
Do I need to give you my arm?
Cyborg parts are needed for me.
Hello ladies...
The Mickey Mouse Ghost flares its teeth at the welcoming crew, who back away in fear.
We won't take your arms. Just don't do anything suggestive with them.
Suggestive?
I'll do something suggestive to you.
The contraband cop zips up Seth's pants for him, glaring at him.
I'm married.
Seth gives her an absurd stare.
So what?
Oh shit!
Ibraxas was getting excited by the beef between Seth and the cop.
I fucked the president's wife once.
Seth poses as if this was a great revelation.
To who may you be married to?
The Mickey Mouse Ghost turns around to the cop.
Which president?
Should we be alarmed by the avian here? Not judging.
Malcom Fortheor, Jim.
Seth looks back at Matthias who was posing like some great figure and rolls his eyes.
No, he's just tired.
He's been tired for, like, a year.
He is just tired and lieing.
Yeah...
t!8ball Does one of the women put her hand on Emmett's shoulder?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Zander.
Seth raises his eyebrows, noticing Emmett's shoulder.
Get that pusi, goat man.
Seth pumps his fist in the air.
As the woman starts to massage Emmett's shoulders, Jim gets a bit uncomfortable.
Ok, I think we should just continue with this.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas find a mechanic shop?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Brakia.
Let's just carry on and get out of this checkpoint...
Ok so Emmette, why are we on this planet?
The Mickey Mouse Ghost is facing the Contraband Cop as it asks this.
t!8ball Does Matthias wake up from cryosleep?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Enchantingtable2013.
It's strange to see someone else like me after all of this time. Even if you're part llama...
Matthias stretches and sighs, annoyed at the fact that he was in a cryochamber.
Why the hell do they always freeze me?
Nice. Hopefully they have ship parts.
Welcome back, sleepy head.
Seth gives Matthias a slap followed by a side hug.
We're the effect of a secret alliance between the llamas and goats. Just a few of each put away their differences.
That sounds cool..
Seth's urges start to take over.
Is prostitution legal here?
Are there any llamas on the planet?
Yes and yes.
Cool, cool...
Seth licks his lips.
Emmett, why are we on this planet?
The Mickey Mouse ghost bounces up and down dramatically, bored.
Seth groans at the ghost's presence.
Shut up, slave labor.
We're here because of us traveling in deep space for like an eternity.
Hey, lady, are there any casinos, vehicle shops, or gas stations here?
This place is like a paradise.
She smirks at Jim.
So yeah.
t!8ball Does Seth woo one of the women?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Bagelwrecker.
t!choose Human | Goat | Llama
ðŸ¤” | Bagelwrecker, I pick Human!
Seth, shut up before I give a picture of your face to the most ugly man and say you want a blow job!
The Mickey Mouse Ghost stomps its feet in the air angrily.
Jim looks at Seth in his peripheral vision.
He would probably like that...
Seth puts some swagger in his walk as he heads to the only human woman in the room.
Hey hottie, were you the one on the comms?
The Coalition leader squeezes Emmett's tense shoulders tightly before stopping the massage.
Good luck finding a man here.
The Mickey Mouse Ghost shakes its head in approval ungodly fast after Jim's response.
Agreed.
There's only a few.
Wait, what?
Jim raises an eyebrow.
Why?
The Mickey Mouse Ghost points at a random woman.
So you are married to the only one here?
The coalition human folds her arms, attempting to act disinterested in spite of Seth's charismatic aroma.
Mhmmm...
If you need to know, all the adult males of our coalition society were sent to war...
How about that drink we were talking about?
Seth winks seductively.
This was before and after the alliance here.
And I think they are dead!
The Mickey Mouse ghost has a high-pitched laugh.
So why not marry someone else?
Jim waves at the crew, heading to a casino named, "Cosino's".
The female scoffs, though it's clear she's getting flustered by Seth.
Sure.
t!8ball Does Jim find a slot machine?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, TheBlade.
How big is this place?
Jim looks around Cosino's realizing that the interior was immensely larger than it appeared to be from the outside.
t!8ball Does Seth ask a woman for a date and gets rejected?
ðŸŽ± | Outlook not so good, Tom Thompson.
t!8ball Does the hybrid lead Emmett to a llama-oriented area of the planet?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Zander.
Jim continues his search for a slot machine, passing many.
ðŸ¤” | Brakia, I pick 5000!
Ibraxas, having made it to a ship mechanic, inquiries the owner about repairing the crew's nav system.
Five thousand Ducketts? Jeez', I feel cheated.
The owner looks at Ibraxas as if he was crazy.
Nav systems are normally more expensive. Plus, It's high quality.
t!8ball Does Seth go to the bar and have a few drinks with the human woman?
ðŸŽ± | My reply is no, Bagelwrecker.
Fine...
Ibraxas rolls his eyes and hands the owner his holodevice, set to "Pay".
By any chance is there a llama here with a scar on her shoulder?
Emmett looks around, trying not to get his hopes too high about finding Fione.
Yo, why is this beer tasting funny?
The beer Seth was drinking was thick enough to give him a liquid mustache.
t!choose 250 D | 500 D | Lose | Lose | 800 D | 1000 D | Lose | 1500 D | 500 D + Free Spin
ðŸ¤” | TheBlade, I pick Lose!
It's a Squoatling recipe. Tastes a little milky. Also highly intoxicating.
Pretty good...
Seth drinks some more, enjoying himself.
Jim sighs, having spent a good amount at a slot machine.
Thats what I thought, no luck..
Seth smirks, his erection tapping the table from below.
I hope it's your milk, hah hah!
The female laughs, having lost her facade. She stirs her drink with a straw in a flirtacious manner.
Haha, no. Want me to tell you what kind of milk it is? You might be turned off...
t!8ball Does the Mickey Mouse Ghost sneak around the planet and steal everything it can?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Tom Thompson.
I don't know...
t!8ball Is there a llama with a scar on her shoulder on the planet?
ðŸŽ± | Reply hazy try again, Zander.
The Mickey Mouse steals a woman's wallet and decides to floss its teeth with a string it finds on the ground.
Is it llama milk or goat milk?
t!8ball Is there a llama with a scar on her shoulder on the planet?
ðŸŽ± | Cannot predict now, Zander.
t!8ball As Ibraxas heads back to the ship, does a shadowy figure follow him?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Brakia.
It's actually male ovisaron milk.
The female giggles and continues to drink it.
Seth grimaces and wipes his mouth off, pushing the drink away.
No, thank you.
I got the piece, guys. I'm headed back to the ship.
Ibraxas heads back to the ship to install the overpriced navigational component into the piloting console.
Get me some wine or vodka then...
Seth doesn't look too happy after being tricked.
I don't think you could handle our 'vodka'.
How strong is it...?
Seth leans towards the human in curiosity.
I mean, you have a squoatling on your ship, right?
The Mickey Mouse Ghost finds a victim and scares them by possessing a gun!
Yeah, he drinks gasoline for a living.
Seth chuckles.
An Ovisaron guard notices the Mickey Mouse Ghost's antics and comes from behind it with a vacuum.
As the their victim runs away, the Mickey Mouse Ghost pickpockets the victim's wallet.
t!8ball Does The Mickey Mouse Ghost get put into a vacuum by an Ovisaron guard?
ðŸŽ± | Most likely, Zander.
t!8ball Does Seth order a round of vodka shots?
ðŸŽ± | Very doubtful, Bagelwrecker.
The Mickey Mouse Ghost desparately tries to get out of the vacuum chamber to no avail. Eventually, it gives up and confesses.
Well, you got me!
But iI must say, it's not my fault as my master Seth has said before that I am a slave!
He told me to do it!
It's his fault! Not mine! I was forced!
`Ovisaron Guard`: The guard pinches her brow, not believing a word of what the ghost said, but still heads over the Seth as per protocol for this type of situation. She shows him the vacuum.\*
This ghost said he's your slave.
Seth groans, his boner deflating.
God damnit, ghost.
The ghost sticks its tongue out at the window to the vacuum chamber.
Yes he is my master! Arrest him for slavery!
I don't own slaves...
Seth's date tries to ignore the guard and Mickey Mouse Ghost, trying to keep the magic of the night alive.
He drinks gasoline for a living?!
Yeah, he beat a bunch of goblins...
Seth props his elbow on the table and holds his head in frustration.
Sure, how about we check the basement of the ship!
The Mickey Mouse Ghost has totally kidnapped people in the past to frame Seth.
He tried shooting one of our civilians...
He's a bit cranky from the trip...
t!8ball does the guard let the ghost go free and arrests seth for slavery?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Tom Thompson.
t!8ball Does the guard arrest the ghost and let Seth go?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Bagelwrecker.
I feel conflicted...
The guard looks to Seth's date, who sighs, trying to signal to her that she should drop any charges to let her get into Seth's pants.
t!8ball Does the guard let the ghost go free and arrests seth for slavery?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Tom Thompson.
t!8ball Does the guard arrest the ghost and let Seth go?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Bagelwrecker.
ðŸ | For the sake of readability, Bagelwrecker and Tom Thompson ask the 8ball back and forth their opposing questions about twelve times until the 8ball finally says no to Bagelwrecker.
Seth, slavery is never an option. Whether it be on semi-permeable beings or not.
Please arrest him! He killed my fame-ly and made me into a slave!
The Mickey Mouse attempts to sound sincere, but it is fooling no one.
You're going into the slammer for 'three GUYs'.
The guard gives Seth an obvious wink, clearly not going to actually arrest him.
t!8ball Ibraxas confronted by the mysterious figure as he fixes the nav systems?
ðŸŽ± | You may rely on it, Brakia.
All done.
Oh yeah.
Seth gets up and holds his hands out in front of him to be "arrested".
Bye "slave"
The figure stalking Ibraxas emerges from the shadows, licking the serrated edge of her blade.
Are you Ibraxssasss?
Ibraxas puts a hand on his holster, before realizing he never packed a pistol. Regardless, he remains stalwart, taking a deep breath.
Who's asking?
Let's get going. I'll see you later, Alli.
The guard puts an arm around Seth's back and pushes him forward lightly.
Alli waves him goodbye playfully, having gotten the guard's hint.
Bye bye, Seth!
Somehow, the Mickey Mouse Ghost manages to manifest itself into a brick able to break the glass of the vacuum, allowing it to exit freely.
Bye bye, Alli.
Seth winks at Alli.
Floran wass given job to hunt Ibraxxxasss...
The figure steps into the light, revealing itself to be a floran. She stalks towards him, readying her sword.
Well, then there's going to be a problem...
Ibraxas looks around in a panic, finding no one else from the crew.
Suddenly, the floran assassin stabs Ibraxas!
Seriously, why do you have a ghost on your ship?
Evidently, the guard does not approve of spectres.
All they do is lie and cheat and steal.
He possesses a diamond I own.
Seth produces the diamond, polishing it.
The Walt Disney Diamond.
Jim gets back to the ship from losing at the casinos.
I'm letting you off with a warning. Technically I need to 'arrest' you though.
The guard stops at a ball pit and smirks at Seth.
YOU'RE BEING PUT IN THE SLAMMER, ELF!
The Mickey Mouse Ghost starts stretching, having found the vacuum chamber a bit limiting.
Yes! And I am karma incarnated!
My luck is just ba-
Jim comes upon the floran and Ibraxas in a standoff, the floran looking bloodthirsty and ready to kill.
The fuck's happening?
Okay, honey.
Seth salutes.
The guard pushes Seth into a ball pit and pretends to lock the cage it's in.
SEE YOU IN THREE GUYS, PUNK!
The guard chuckles to herself and leaves the scene, heading to the crew's ship to make sure they didn't have anything too illegal.
Floran had job to do. Sssshe did it.
The floran assassin smiles maliciously.
Ibraxas sweats and holds his chest where she stabbed him, looking at Jim for help.
Jim. Little help?
The Mickey Mouse Ghost floats to Seth's cage, thinking it was an actual prison cell.
Seth, karma is up on you!
What's happening?
Seth waves as the guard leaves and gets up from the ball pit.
Love you.
Kambras?
Emmett's eyes boggle out of his head in a pleasant surprise, finding not his girlfriend, but her best friend she told just about everything to!
Is that you?
Jim, I need some help... She fucking stabbed me...
Ibraxas coughs, trying to hold it together.
Uh, guard can you help me out over here!?
It appears that no guards can hear Jim's pleas except for the one that just locked up Seth. While the guard gets to them, he's going to have to get his hands dirty himself.
t!8ball Does Seth leave the cell?
ðŸŽ± | It is decidedly so, Bagelwrecker.
Bored, the Mickey Mouse Ghost heads back to the ship at lightning speed.
Jim, you cant do it yourself?
Kambras!
Emmett!
Kambras runs to Emmett and picks him up, hugging him.
Move, robot. Floran'sss job does not concern you.
The floran assassin attempts to shoo Jim away, salivating over the reward she would receive for Ibraxas's bounty.
t!8ball Does Jim and a guard disarm the person attacking Ibraxas?
ðŸŽ± | Very doubtful, TheBlade.
Saddened by the interruption ruining his erection, Seth decides to leave his date and heads to Emmett.
Hey Emmett, I'm back from my date!
Kambras is here!
Hey, watch it you clumsy guard!
Hey woman I shot.
t!8ball Does the Mickey Mouse Ghost possess the knife and try to stab the assassin with it?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Tom Thompson.
Kambras sighs upon seeing Seth.
Seth.
Yes?
I'm so sorry I didn't tell you beforehand... They were madly in love with each other...
Emmett maintains a poker face to try and avoid the embarrassment of Seth and Kambras talking about him having sex with Fione.
It's alright, I'm sorry I shot you and Fione, I was trying to protect Emmett... You know what they did...
The floran assassin dodges the knife and kicks it away. The floran scoffs arrogantly.
Floran doessss not need knife. Floran will kill you anywaysss.
The floran assassin licks her lips and holds out her sharp, thorny talons.
Why does it always have to be the crazy ones...?
Jim readies his fists, ready for an outbreak of fisticuffs.
I kinda knew to be honest.
Seth, in an act befitting a short attention span, looks at his holodevice for a second and sees an advertisement.
My free credit score?
Emmett looks away in embarrassment.
We kinda did some things before that video, Seth...
Kambras nudges Emmett in jest.
It was his first time though.
Good.
I will keep that holotape as a good memory...
t!8ball Does Ibraxas run over to the medbay and start wrapping up his wounds?
ðŸŽ± | Signs point to yes, Zander.
Kambras shakes her head, wanting to change the subject.
I mean, it's been so long, fellas. How's it been?
t!choose Floran Fights Jim | Floran chases Ibraxas
ðŸ¤” | Brakia, I pick Floran Fights Jim!
Show me what cha' got...
Jim flips his hand over and waves her in, ready to fight.
Seth shrugs.
It's been alright, just getting by.
Floran will deal with you firsssst!
The floran lunges at Jim.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas suck his own penis and choke himself to death?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, Bagelwrecker.
t!8ball Does Jim punch the floran?
ðŸŽ± | Most likely, TheBlade.
We have loads of more people on our ship.
Emmett rolls his eyes and laughs.
Half of them don't do shit.
t!choose chest | left arm | head | right arm
ðŸ¤” | TheBlade, I pick right arm!
The floran assassin rescinds her right arm, and hisses at Jim in fury.
Augh! Floran won't like thisss. Robotss don't have any blood to ssspill!
I do all the shit.
Seth poses.
Emmett sneers.
Like, literally. He does shit.
For the last time, I am not a robot!
Emmett has become lazy and only does some of the shit.
Seth elbows Emmett jokingly, knowing how much he does.
Floran doesssn't care what you are. All you are to Floran issss prey.
The floran slashes at Jim, scratching his cheek.
He's probably gotten lazy do to a lack of 'motivation'...
While Kambras wasn't Emmett's girlfriend initially, she still smirks flirtaciously.
That's probably it. Give him some motivation later.
Seth winks.
You got one hell of a lisp there, lady.
Jim wipes the blood off his cheek, giving a determined smile.
t!8ball Does the Mickey Mouse Ghost go to sleep?
ðŸŽ± | My sources say no, Tom Thompson.
Emmett cries out, the embarrassment unbearable.
Guys, don't talk about me like this!
Shhhh, my son.
Seth puts a finger to Emmett's snout.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas arm himself with a scalpel?
ðŸŽ± | As I see it, yes, Zander.
Ibraxas tries to wrap up his chest wound and grabs a scalpel, his arm quivering.
I'm going to stab that bitch!
t!8ball Does the floran take out the gaurd?
ðŸŽ± | Don't count on it, Brakia.
Dude, we're all friends here. No need to hide anything...
Kambras winks at Emmett.
Floran has no time for guardssss...
The floran assassin growls at the guard who finally reached them.
Emmmett holds his arms together, flustered.
I dunno. Just a bit uncomfortable. I'm really happy seeing you again, but I'm just a little unused to... y'know.
Emmett was getting more turned on than he has ever been in a long, long time. He clearly has a type.
You need some training again?
Seth gives Emmett a noogie.
Emmett, after a couple of seconds, gets out of Seth's grasp.
Shut up Seth.
You're a little nervous. I get it.
Jim growls at the floran assassin and leaps towards her, arms ready to grapple.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas put his head between his buttcheeks and fart in his face?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Bagelwrecker.
Ibraxas, in an attempt to psyche himself up, bends his head to his rear to deal with the pain from his chest wound. Unfortunately, this causes him to fart in his own face.
Ibraxas stretches back and scowls in disgust.
Why did I do that?
t!8ball Does Jim put the floran into a headlock?
ðŸŽ± | Without a doubt, TheBlade.
Seth and Kambras look at each other creepily.
The floran assassin digs her talons into Jim's arm, trying to pry herself from his grip.
Releassse me!
Hey Seth...
Think I should carry Emmett like I used to?
Kambras looks over to Emmett, who really didn't want to be in this situation despite finding her hot.
CALM DOWN LADY!
Jim tightens his grasp, bearing through the pain.
The floran digs her claws in deeper, feeling a bit weary from Jim's grasp.
I will sssstab you!!
Dooo itt.
t!8ball Does Kambras pick up the goat?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Zander.
Emmett gulps, the brunt of embarrassment being too much for him.
This feels so embarrassing...
Emmett finally snaps, caving in.
But also right...
t!8ball Does the floran escape the headlock and chase after Ibraxas?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, definitely, Brakia.
That's the spirit, you big baby.
Kambras cradles Emmett, thinking about Fione solemnly for a bit.
The floran assassin slips out of Jim's grasp after scratching him enough and runs into the ship.
I have a job to finisssh!
Hey, GET BACK HERE!
Jim chases after the assassin.
t!8ball Does Ibraxas choke on a fart cloud?
ðŸŽ± | Yes, Bagelwrecker.
